mapper.sql: a.AUTH_ID AS authId , a.USER_ID AS userId , a.SERVICE_ID AS serviceId , a.AUTH_IP AS authIp , a.USE_DESC AS useDesc , a.USE_DEPT AS useDept , a.USER_NAME AS userName , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag , dsu.USERNAME AS username , dsi.SERVICE_NAME AS serviceName
